title: MidnightAlpha Cardano L2 brand marketing, onboarding, & edu.
summary: Lack of liquidity and useage on Cardano, as stated by community members in public forums over the last 6 months.
solution: Midnight is a Selective Privacy blockchain built on Cardano  goes live Dec. 8th. We want to onboard and educate new professional users with MidnightAlpha brand to drive use and liquidity to Cardano.

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Who you’re targeting, how you’ll reach them, and why this matters for Cardano?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer: We intend to attract, onboard, and educate fresh B2B, B2C, and B2G professionals, organizations, and entities from traditional web2 arenas in the extraordinary benefits of leveraging Midnight Network Blockchain, Cardano's first partnerchain, which boasts being the world's first selective privacy blockchain built on the robust and resilient backbone of the Cardano Network. We will leverage our MidnightAlpha brand channels in social media outlets such as X, LinkedIn, Discord, Instagram, Facebook, and Reddit to attract curious professionals, government employees, politicians, and others in medical, voting, and asset management

sub_fields.title: Provide a list of key activities of your project:
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
- Daily news aggregation of Cardano, Midnight, Crypto, and macro economic updates and breaking news that will interest those in the financial, government, and professiona sectors that we are targetting.
- Clever, informative, and sometimes humorous morsels that people will enjoy reading and come to depend and trust our channel.
- Weekly informative news reels updating busy professionals on the TL;DR of the week's macro economic events, an our take on them.
- Weekly X Spaces designed bring in the curious and give them the resources to start their new journey in Midnight, Cardano, and web3.
- Constant showcasing of upcomin and advancing projects within the Midnight, Cardano, web3, and tech community, that will serve to educate iindividuals on the potential of Midnight and Cardano.

sub_fields.title: What are your success metrics?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
We live and die by data. 



We intend to track our metrics in followers, links, interactions, a/b testing, and to make all the information public in a github repository for MidnightAlpha.



Our goal is to attract and onboard professionals that are already in industries that could benefit from Midnight and Cardano technology, but may not be aware that we hold the potential solutions.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
MidnightAlpha brand channels, videos, news, and education will be the funnel by whic we attract an entire new segment of the professional public to Midnight and Cardano. With Cardano's rubst security and resilience, and Midnight's selective privacy functionality, I is a homerun solution forompanies looking for web3 solutions with auditability, compliance, and selective privacy baked in!

They just need to be made aware of it. And we will accomplish thi with the following:

- Daily enlightening educational tidbits wrapped in memes, clever analogies, examples, and filled with humor. These bits will educate those on basice fundamentals of blockchain. We believe that an educated consumer is the best consumer!
- Daily news aggregation that affects all professionals, and highlighting how web3 solutions can be the answer to some if not all of these issues.
- Weekly news update reels
- Weekly iteractive X spaces for newbies and professionals to ask about adapting Cardano and Midnight to thier business models, "Reimagining all the world's digital systems".
- Becoming a source of truth and news that our growing community of varied business professionals will come to rely on and enjoy.
- A generous daily protion of resources and educational links and invitations to get the curious plugged into the ecosystem where they can thrive and grow.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
Listen guys, On December 8th, the lights come on at Midnight. If we play our cards right, we cn drive enterprise corporations, institutions, and governments to Midnight to reimagine everything that they have been doing up till now. MidnightAlpha brand channels will be the onboarding and educational funnel, getting our curious new friends to the right resources for effective adoption. This adoption will bring liquidity to Midnight, and therefore Cardano, as every Midnight SPO must also be a Cardano SPO, as they are partner chains. Everything that is good for Midnight directly benefits Cardano.

Midnight's Light go on December 8th, and we can really drive businesses that have had no options in web3 until now. Not only will the lights come on at Midnight, but Midnight will make the lights in Cardano shine brighter than ever.

Give us 4 months to show you all what we can do!

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
Existing capabilities & why I’m well suited to deliver this project



I’m an active builder and advocate in the Cardano and Midnight ecosystems, with a specific focus on privacy-preserving, real-world use cases. Over the past years I’ve:



Participated in multiple Midnight and Cardano hackathons, including building prototypes that use selective privacy and zero-knowledge proofs.



Developed and refined concepts and architectures for decentralized identity, medical data sharing, and financial/privacy tools on Cardano/Midnight.



Built and led community-facing educational initiatives, ranging from presentations and demos to long-form explanatory content aimed at non-technical professionals.



This project—using Midnight Alpha to onboard financial, medical, and other professionals—sits exactly at the intersection of what I already do: translating advanced privacy tech (ZKPs, selective disclosure, partner-chain architecture) into clear, trustworthy workflows that real-world professionals can understand and adopt.



From a technical and product perspective, I bring:



Hands-on experience with the Midnight stack (Alpha devnet environment, documentation, privacy concepts, and the Cardano–Midnight relationship).



Strong conceptual background in compliance-sensitive domains, especially finance and healthcare, where privacy, auditability, and consent are critical.



The ability to design step-by-step onboarding journeys: from high-level education → interactive demos → guided pilots → feedback loops and refinements.



From a communication and adoption perspective, I specialize in:



Explaining Midnight not just as “tech” but as a solution to real problems: data minimization, regulatory risk, professional liability, and client privacy.



Tailoring messaging for different professional audiences (financial advisors, compliance officers, clinicians, administrators, etc.).



Creating structured materials (slide decks, one-pagers, walkthroughs, use-case maps) that these professionals can share internally within their organizations.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
This proposal will be considered successfully delivered if:



Public GitHub repository is live and documented



A dedicated repo (e.g., midnight-professional-onboarding-metrics) is created and the link is shared in the final report.



The repo includes a clear README.md explaining:



The project purpose



What metrics are tracked



How data is collected and updated



Metrics are consistently recorded and version-controlled



A /metrics directory contains structured data (CSV/JSON/Markdown) with, at minimum:



Number of workshops / sessions delivered



Number of participants per session



Breakdown by professional type (financial, medical, other)



Number of Midnight Alpha demos completed



Number of organizations requesting follow-up or pilots



Metrics files are updated on a regular schedule (e.g., after each workshop or at least monthly) with clear timestamps.



Summary dashboards / reports are available in the repo



A /reports or /analysis folder includes:



At least one summary report of outcomes (e.g., FINAL_REPORT.md or similar)



High-level KPI summaries and charts (even simple Markdown tables or basic visualizations).



Data is anonymous and compliant with privacy best practices



No personal identifying information of participants is stored.



Only aggregate or anonymized data is published (e.g., counts, categories, and high-level feedback themes).



Linkage to Catalyst reporting



The final Catalyst report references this GitHub repo as the primary source of metrics, so reviewers can independently verify:



Activities performed



Measured outcomes



Alignment with the Education theme and onboarding goals.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer:
Evidence of completion of Milestone 1



Milestone 1 – Design and preparation of educational materials for professional onboarding to Midnight



This milestone will be considered complete when the following evidence is available:



Public GitHub repository with education assets



A dedicated repo (e.g. midnight-professional-onboarding) containing:



/curriculum folder with structured outlines for at least two tracks:



Financial professionals



Medical / healthcare professionals



/slides folder with the finalized slide decks in source format (e.g. .pptx/.key or exported .pdf).



/labs folder with step-by-step Midnight Alpha hands-on exercises, including prerequisites and clear instructions.



Documented learning objectives and session plans



A CURRICULUM_OVERVIEW.md (or similar) in the repo, listing:



Learning objectives for each track.



Session structure (e.g. 60–90 minute format, topics per section).



How each session introduces Midnight and its benefits for Cardano in a professional context.



Ready-to-run workshop kit







Links to the education repo and key files.



Date of completion.



Once these items are live and linked, reviewers can independently verify that all core educational content and Midnight Alpha demos needed for onboarding are fully prepared before moving to live sessions.

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: onboarding

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer: This project delivers a structured onboarding journey that takes financial, medical, and other professionals from “I’ve heard of Cardano” to “I understand how to responsibly use Midnight in my work.” We design short, role-specific learning paths that explain Midnight as Cardano’s selective-privacy partner chain, why that matters for compliance, data protection, and client trust, and how simple example flows can be implemented using Midnight Alpha. Onboarding happens through live workshops, hands-on labs, and clear follow-up playbooks that participants can take back to their organizations. Success is measured by the number of professionals trained, Midnight Alpha demos completed, and organizations that request deeper pilots.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer: Acceptance will be based on clear, verifiable onboarding results. The project is successful if: (1) At least 120 professionals (finance, medical, and related fields) attend one or more Midnight education sessions; (2) A minimum of 60 participants complete at least one guided Midnight Alpha hands-on demo; (3) At least 8 workshops/webinars are delivered, with agendas and materials published in a public GitHub repo; (4) At least 5 organizations request follow-up conversations or pilots; (5) All onboarding metrics (attendance, demos completed, organization interest, qualitative feedback themes) are recorded in the public metrics repository and referenced in the final Catalyst report.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer: Evidence of completion will be provided through transparent, verifiable artifacts. All educational assets (curricula, slide decks, lab guides) and facilitator notes will be stored in a public GitHub repo dedicated to this project. For each workshop/webinar, we will maintain dated attendance logs (anonymized), session agendas, and links to the exact materials used. Completion of hands-on Midnight Alpha demos will be documented via simple checklists or short post-session summaries in the repo. Organizations requesting follow-up or pilots will be counted and recorded in aggregate, with non-sensitive notes on their sector and interest. A final FINAL_REPORT.md in the metrics repo will summarize activities, KPIs, lessons learned, and links to all relevant files, allowing Catalyst reviewers to independently verify that the onboarding goals were met.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer: Evidence of completion will be provided through a public, verifiable trail of artifacts. The education hub (GitHub repo or website) will contain the finalized curricula, slide decks, and lab guides, each with timestamps and version history. For every education session, we will publish an entry with the date, agenda, materials used, and anonymized attendance summary. The resources section will show a live list of official Midnight/Cardano docs and vetted explainers, with a visible update log to confirm monthly curation. The news-aggregation stream will have an accessible archive (e.g., dated digests or feed entries) demonstrating consistent, trustworthy coverage. Entertainment and engagement outputs (AMAs, short clips, themed sessions) will be listed with links to recordings or posts. A final FINAL_REPORT.md (or equivalent page) will summarize what was delivered, link to all sections, and map each acceptance criterion to the specific evidence item, allowing reviewers to independently verify completion.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer: Our budget represents a full time marketing, onboarding, education, video, and news aggregation initiative that will be 40 hours a week for 4 months, with a/b testing where appropriate and metrics tracking for accountability. We beiever that this will be an invaluable asset to the community, and the new onboarded users and businesses. We will be leveraging a first to maket advvantage for selective privacy of Midnight while also serving the community in a variety of ways.
